include('aws-20200911/Resource/NetworkingAndContentDelivery/VpcTrafficMirroring')

## card
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20200911 bootstrap
include('aws-20200911/bootstrap')
' loads the VpcTrafficMirroring element
include('aws-20200911/Resource/NetworkingAndContentDelivery/VpcTrafficMirroring')
VpcTrafficMirroringCard('vpc_traffic_mirroring', 'Vpc Traffic Mirroring', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```
